snippet.title: First Strike 1.3 - Update on 25.2.2016 [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
First Strike is going another step further! Welcome to the next major update:

Download it here:
iOS: http://bit.ly/fsiosgame
Play: http://bit.ly/fsandroidgame
Amazon: http://bit.ly/fsamazonapp

Two brand new Superweapons: The earth burning Solar Laser Satellite and the subverting Infiltration Special Forces.

Replay Function: Automatically records the last 8 Minutes of gameplay and you can trim a movie and share it instantly.

Hardcore Mode: New AI Difficulty available if playing with more than 8 enemies and new achievements for every nation to beat it.

Check out our website for more news and screenshots: http://www.firststrike.mobi
follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/firststrikegame
like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/firststrikegame
suscribe to our newsletter: http://eepurl.com/WcPwj
